text: Margaret Colin (born May 26, 1958) is an American actress. She works mostly on television. She played Margo Montgomery Hughes on the television series As the World Turns. She played Eleanor Waldorf-Rose in the television series Gossip Girl. Colin was born in Brooklyn, New York. ==References== Category:Actors from New York City Category:American television actors Category:1958 births Category:Living people
title: Margaret Colin
